After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Billing Inquiries / Number of Billing Inquiries
(Number of Accurate Billings / Total Number of Billings) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve billing disputes.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Billing Disputes / Number of Billing Disputes

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.KPIS: Percentage of invoices paid on time
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of invoices that are paid by the due date.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: (Number of Invoices Paid on Time / Total Number of Invoices) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of billing errors.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: (Number of Billing Errors / Total Number of Bills Issued) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the billing support provided.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Billing Support

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete a billing cycle.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: Total Time from Invoice Creation to Payment Received / Number of Invoices

After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of outstanding invoices that are collected.
After Sales+Customer Service+Billing Sup.FORMULA: (Total Amount Collected from Outstanding Invoices / Total Amount of Outstanding Invoices) * 100
